name: FACE<value>
description:
A small puzzle platformer made in 48 hours for the 2022 GMTK Game jam.

The player must open doors by matching the value on a set of switches to the value of the dice.

Dice moving to the right will increase in value, and dice moving to the left will decrease in value.

Controls:

W -  Jump

A/D - Left/Right

S - Fall through platform

J - Push dice

R - Reset Level

* Built in tutorial
